mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_tgks_mar_marzaccount (id, tgksid, iosuuid, androiduuid, ioskey, androidkey, type, status, sessionid, vip, name, userid, lv, ap, apmax, bp, bpmax, cardnum, cardmax, gold, fp, coin, bossids,createtime, endtime, remark) VALUES (#{id}, #{tgksId}, #{iosUuid}, #{androidUuid}, #{iosKey}, #{androidKey}, #{type}, #{status}, #{sessionId}, #{vip}, #{name}, #{userId}, #{lv}, #{ap}, #{apMax}, #{bp}, #{bpMax}, #{cardNum}, #{cardMax}, #{gold}, #{fp}, #{coin}, #{bossIds}, #{createTime}, #{endTime}, #{remark})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_tgks_mar_marzaccount SET tgksid = #{tgksId}, iosuuid = #{iosUuid}, androiduuid = #{androidUuid}, ioskey = #{iosKey}, androidkey = #{androidKey}, type = #{type}, status = #{status}, sessionid = #{sessionId}, vip = #{vip}, name = #{name}, userid = #{userId}, lv = #{lv}, ap = #{ap}, apmax = #{apMax}, bp = #{bp}, bpmax = #{bpMax}, cardnum = #{cardNum}, cardmax = #{cardMax}, gold = #{gold}, fp = #{fp}, coin = #{coin}, bossids = #{bossIds}, endtime = #{endTime}, remark = #{remark} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.delete:
